title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Using Simbrief with Salty 747 8 mod
description:
In this how to we are going to look at how to plan a flight plan created using SimBrief can be loaded directly into our airplane using the Salty 747-8 addon for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020.

If you like to use the mod use link below to download it:

Salty 747 cockpit
https://github.com/saltysimulations/salty-747

The tool used to plan our flight simBrief can be found here: https://www.simbrief.com
